title: Sharm el-Sheikh: Evening Desert Tour with Bedouin Dinner
experiences:
Enjoy a candlelit dinner at a Bedouin camp in the Mander Valley
Ride a camel across the desert sands
Watch amazing fire and belly dance shows
Look at the stars through digital telescopes and learn about the constellations
Try some traditional Bedouin "habbak" tea
fullDescription:
Benefit from pick-up at your hotel in Sharm El Sheikh and then journey to a quad bike center far from the crowds and traffic, in an isolated desert location.

Meet your instructor and get a safety briefing. Benefit from the expertise of your instructor as they escort you through the desert for about 2 hours. You will make your way to a Bedouin camp, where you can take an optional camel ride. 

Reconnect with nature, surrounded by mountains, and get welcome drinks on arrival at the camp. Try some traditional habbak (wild mint) tea and learn how the Bedouins bake their bread. Then, climb to the top of a small hill to watch an amazing sunset and feel the desert breeze at the end of the day. Return to the Bedouin tent to enjoy an open buffet dinner of rice, vegetables, salads, tahini, fried chicken, shish kebab, fruits, local bread and sodas.

Watch an incredible fire show and belly dance show before looking at the stars through digital telescopes. Get interesting explanations about the night sky from an English-speaking astronomer. Return to Sharm el-Sheikh and get dropped off at your hotel on arrival.
includes:
Hotel pick-up and drop off
Transportation by air-conditioned bus
English-speaking guide
Dinner and drinks
Optional camel ride
Quad bike

title: Quad Runner Bike Adventure: Sharm el Sheikh
experiences:
See the desert of Egypt in a whole new way
Race through the sands on your four-wheeler
Enjoy a picture perfect sunrise or sunset
Stop for tea in a traditional Bedouin tent
fullDescription:
As the sand whips past your eyes and ears, your heart beats faster. Here you are, in the grand desert near Sharm el Sheikh, driving your very own Quad Runner through the dunes and desert in a way that you'll never forget.

Your day begins with a pick-up from your hotel in Sharm el Sheikh, and then a quick drive to get some safety instructions and lessons on the bikes. You'll also be taught how to tie up your headropes, so that you don't come back all covered in sand and bruised from the pressure.

Then, we're off to the races. This unmissable experience brings you through the desert at the perfect time of day: sunrise or sunset! You will head to a high point in Wadi Al-Aat, where tea is served in a traditional Bedouin tent. At the end of your tea, we'll race back to town, and then finally return to your hotel.
includes:
All transfers by air-conditioned car
Quad bike
Tour-leader

title: Ras Mohammed National Park: Snorkelling Trip
experiences:
Visit the Ras Mohammed National Park
Snorkel in the most beautiful reef in Egypt
Experience an impressively colorful underwater world
See mangroves, the only trees that grow in salt wate
Discover the magical deep lake, which is suitable for swimming
fullDescription:
Be collected at your accommodation in Sharm by a modern air-conditioned mini-bus. Take a for a short drive to the Ras Mohammed National Park. Your guide will tell you interesting facts on the way there.

Have the opportunity to go snorkeling in Egypt's most beautiful reef. Marvel at a remarkably colorful underwater world. Mangroves are the only trees that grow in salt water. In the Ras Mohammed National Park, you can find these unique trees that are actually native to Central Africa.

Discover the Magic Lake, a large deep lake suitable for swimming. The Bedouin gave his name to the magic lake and you will learn fantastic stories about him. After your snorkeling experience at the Ras Mohammed National Park, be returned to your accommodation in time for dinner.
includes:
Transportation in an air-conditioned bus
Tour guide
Entrance fee to the Ras Mohamed National Park
Snorkeling equipment

title: Sharm El-Sheikh Airport Transfer
experiences:
Enjoy a private transfer from Sharm El Sheikh airport to your hotel
Get advice about where to go, where to shop and what to eat during your stay from your knowledgeable driver
fullDescription:
Our Representative will meet you at Sharm El Sheikh airport holding a sign with your name on it. From there, enjoy a comfortable transfer to your hotel in Sharm in an air conditioned private van. Upon arrival, your driver will help you until you arrive in your room at the hotel .

We offer transfers from Sharm airport to any hotel in Sharm and from any hotel to the airport .

During the transfer our representative will give you plenty of information for your holiday in Sharm, including, for example, tips about the weather, shopping, restaurants and much more. Our representative will also provide you with an idea of all the tours and excursions available to you during your vacation.

Feel free to book a one-way or return transfer as you prefer .The minimum number to book this transfer is only 2 people.

title: Cairo Day Tour from Sharm El Sheikh by Air
experiences:
Take a full-day tour to Cairo from Sharm El Sheikh, including a return flight
Visit some of Cairo's most amazing sights and attractions, including the Great Pyramids and the Egyptian Museum
Enjoy a delicious lunch at a local restaurant in Cairo
fullDescription:
Our representative will pick you up from your hotel in Sharm El Sheikh. You will then be transferred to Sharm El Sheikh Airport to catch your flight to Cairo. At Cairo Airport you will be met and assisted by another of our representatives.

Our Egyptologist guide will accompany you to visit the great pyramid of Giza, which is the only existing wonder of the seven wonders of the ancient world. At the Giza plateau, you will not only see the great pyramid of Khufu, known as Cheops, but also the pyramid of Chefren, the pyramid of Mykerinus, the valley temple of Khefren and the iconic Great Sphinx. This amazing complex of structures dates back to almost 5,000 years ago.

From there, you will be taken to the Egyptian museum, which houses around 150,000 artifacts that date thousands of years to ancient Egyptian civilization. This is considered the largest and most precious collection of Egyptian art in the world. Take your chance to admire the incredible treasures of the boy-king Tutankhamun.

After the museum, you will also have the chance to wander in the oldest bazaar in the middle east, the Khan El Khalili Bazaar, where you will feel the atmosphere of living in Islamic Cairo hundreds of years ago. The bazaar dates back to 1382, A.D., and is just one of the fascinating places we will see, giving you a real taste of the ancient city of Cairo.

At the end of the day you will be transferred to Cairo Airport for a flight back to Sharm El Sheikh.
includes:
Pick-up and drop-off from your hotel in Sharm
All transfers by a private air-conditioned vehicle
Return flight ticket Sharm / Cairo / Sharm
English-speaking Egyptologist guide during your trip
Entrance fees to the mentioned sites in Cairo
Lunch meal at local restaurant
Cairo Shopping tours in Cairo
All taxes and service charges

title: Cairo: Day Tour from Sharm el Sheikh
experiences:
Embark on a journey through time into the history of Egypt's ancient pharaohs and visit the main sights of Cairo
Drive through the Sinai Desert and visit the fascinating Egyptian National Museum with over 120,000 artefacts
Admire the Pyramids of Giza, take a look at the impressive Sphinx and stroll around the exotic markets
fullDescription:
Visit the impressive capital of Egypt with all its fascinating sights and enjoy the beautiful route along the coast of the Gulf of Suez and through the imposing Sinai Desert.

Visit the Egyptian Museum and admire the collection of more than 120,000 pieces of art. Take a look at the fascinating artifacts from the Old, Middle and New Kingdoms of Egypt as well as the exhibition of King Tutankhamen.

Then visit the pyramids of Giza – one of the seven wonders of the ancient world and the only one largely intact. Admire the imposing pyramids of Cheops, Chephren and Mykerinos. Explore the Giza Plateau and admire the beautiful scenery.

Then explore the Valley of the Kings and admire the impressive Sphinx. Visit the surrounding temples and enjoy lunch at one of the local restaurants. Stroll through the markets of Cairo and see the local produce, before returning to your hotel at the end of the day.
includes:
Bus trip from Sharm el Sheikh to Cairo and back
Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx visit
Egyptian National Museum visit
Tour guide
Lunch
All entrance fees to the sights

title: From Sharm: Introduction to Scuba Diving with Lunch
experiences:
Sail along the Red Sea to your first dive spot, where you'll see bright marine life
Receive diving instruction and carry out a safely dive with your guide
See native wildlife in their natural environment
fullDescription:
Pick-up from your hotel in Sharm El Sheikh will be around 8:15 AM.On arrival at the marina, you are off to Tiran island for the day to receive your introduction to diving. The experienced diver will talk through with you all the basics of the dive and introduce you to the aqualung. Once you have this mastered, the rest is easy. They will go through the safety precautions that are taken and ensure that you fully understand the sign language that is used underwater. After being kitted up with the jacket, tank, weights and mask, its time to enter the water. When you are ready they will take you down below the surface at a steady pace and they will be with you at all times.

The rest of the day is spent taking a second dive if you have booked one or swimming or snorkeling at either of the other two stops the boat will make. The transfer vehicle will be waiting for you when you return to the port in the late afternoon and they will transfer you back directly to your hotel.
includes:
Buffet lunch
Light refreshments
Professional licensed diver/guide
Hotel pick-up and drop off
Transport by air-conditioned minivan
All snorkeling equipment

title: Private Sharm El Sheikh Airport Transfers
experiences:
Enjoy Sharm El Sheikh's scenery without having to worry about traffic or maps
Relax, knowing your driver will track your flight and allow for delays and early arrivals to Sharm El Sheikh Airport
Enjoy the privacy and comfort of a private ride through the Red Sea region
Avoid Sharm El Sheikh Airport's long lines for cabs with your priority reservation
fullDescription:
Arriving at a new destination can be a stressful experience. But with this private transfer from Sharm El Sheikh Airport to Sharm El Sheikh hotels, you can take the worry out of finding a taxi and skip the long lines with a guaranteed meet and greet.

An Egypt Excursions representative will pick you up outside the exit door of Sharm El Sheikh Airport and assist you with your luggage. They will be holding a sign with your name written on it, ready to transport you by private air-conditioned vehicle to your hotel.

The vehicles can take up to 4 passengers, and wheelchair accesible vehicles are available on request, for a small extra charge. Simply provide your flight details and hotel name on booking, and Egypt Excursions will make the arrangements. For transfers to Sharm El Sheikh Airport at the end of your trip, a transfer time of 2 hours before your flight time will be necessary.
includes:
1-way transfer by private air-conditioned vehicle
English-speaking representative at Sharm El Sheikh Airport
Luggage handling

title: From Sharm el-Sheikh: Mount Sinai Sunrise Climb
Sharm el-Sheikh: Panoramic Submarine Adventure
experiences:
Immerse yourself in Nemo's world and let the beauty of the world under the Red Sea enchant you
Enjoy an incredible look at the colorful fish and impressive coral from your submarine
Relax as you explore the depths of the sea
fullDescription:
Discover the breathtaking underwater world of the Red Sea from an incredible new perspective. After a pick-up from your hotel, go directly to the submarine and immerse yourself in the Red Sea. This modern submarine features over 18 panoramic windows, which offer unique views of the coral reefs and a fascinating variety of exotic and colorful fish.

Sit back and relax in your seat as you venture to the depths of the sea. Discover the breathtaking varieties of coral and fish of all shapes and sizes.
includes:
Transfer to and from your hotel in an air-conditioned vehicle
Mineral water onboard during the tour

title: Snorkeling Adventure: Ras Mohammed National Park by Boat
experiences:
Sail into the beauty of Egypt's only National Park
Dive into the refreshing waters for a look at the underwater world
Make 3 stops along the way
Relax on board with free water and soft drinks
fullDescription:
The crystal clear waters stretch out in front of you as you sail towards one of the most beautiful sites for snorkeling anywhere in the world. An easy drive and sail from Sharm el Sheikh, your day of snorkeling will be filled with colorful creatures and over 130 sorts of coral and 1,000s of brightly colored fish in Egypt's only National Park.

Departing your hotel in Sharm el Sheikh at 8:00, you will take a quick drive to the dock before sailing off into the paradise. There are two or three stops for snorkeling along the way, depending on conditions. You will stop in the Red Sea, Gulf of Aqba, and the Gulf of Suez. There's gear to hire on board, or bring your own and enjoy your day out at sea!

Arrive back at your hotel around 17:00.
includes:
All transfers by air-conditioned vehicle
Entrance fees to Ras Mohamed Park
Cruise yacht ticket and fees
Lunch
Snorkeling guide aboard cruise
1 bottled water & soft drink free

title: Sharm: Tiran Island Snorkeling Day Trip with Lunch
experiences:
Sail across the Red Sea to Tiran Island
Snorkel with the marine life of an underwater sanctuary
Enjoy lunch aboard the boat and relax on the white sand beaches
fullDescription:
Climb aboard and set sail across the Red Sea from Sharm El Sheikh to the sanctuary of Tiran Island. Upon arrival, discover an underwater paradise for snorkeling and avail of the services of experienced instructors. Benefit from tips for beginners and explanations about the local marine life.

Take 1 or 2 dives to experience the underwater landscapes and encounter a variety of different fish and other sea life. Avail of soft drinks throughout the day, along with lunch served on board the boat in the afternoon. Find perfect spots to relax on the white sandy beaches.
includes:
Transportation by air-conditioned van
Buffet lunch on board
Snorkeling equipment
Light refreshments
Professional licensed diver guide
Hotel pick-up and drop off

title: Sharm : Quad Bike Safari Adventure with Transfers
experiences:
Cross the dunes of the Sinai Desert by Quad Bike
Stop at a Bedouin tent and try some local Bedouin tea
Experience a Sinai Desert sunset from a unique perspective
fullDescription:
Benefit from pick-up at your hotel in Sharm El Sheikh, and then journey to a Quad Bike center not from the resort, but far from the crowds and traffic in an isolated desert location.

Meet your instructor and get a safety briefing and some tips on how to get the best out of what lies ahead. Benefit from the expertize of your instructors as they escort you through the desert for about 2 hours. Make your way to a Bedouin tent, where you will be welcomed with a complimentary drink.

Get some time to freshen up while the Quad Bike engines cool down. Purchase extra drinks if you still need hydrating before setting off again. Experience the drama of Echo Mountain, where the fun really kicks in! Scout around the mountain landscape and take stunning souvenir photos.

Follow your instructors to secret passages deep in the desert for the most thrilling Quad Bike ride. At the end of your adventure, sit back and relax on the journey back to your hotel.
includes:
Hotel pick-up and drop off
Transportation by air-conditioned vehicle
Tea in a Bedouin tent

title: Sharm El Sheikh: Private Airport Transfer with London Cab
experiences:
Be driven by a professional chauffeur
Choose between airport or hotel pick-up
Enjoy a private transfer
Relish in the transport of an air-conditioned vehicle
fullDescription:
Avoid the torment and stress of waiting for taxis by opting for this affordable airport transfer. Your skilled driver will be waiting for you at the airport with a name sign in the arrivals hall. From here they will help with your luggage before guiding you to your premium airport transfer.

For hotel pick-up, your driver will meet you at your hotel lobby. Please be ready and waiting 10 minutes before your designated meeting time. It is recommended to give your flight number in advance, so your driver can arrive at the appropriate time. If there happens to be a delay in your flight, your driver will be waiting until you arrive safely at no extra fee.

All drivers have excellent experience and a wealth of knowledge of the city. If you have any questions at any stage of your transfer, simply ask. Whether you’d prefer music, talking or simply snoozing after a long journey, your driver will get you safely to the right destination.
includes:
Professional chauffeur
Airport or hotel pick-up
Private transfer
Transport by air-conditioned vehicle
Local taxes
Airport taxes
All taxes, fees and handling charges
Gratuities

title: 7-Hour Desert Safari from Sharm el-Sheikh
experiences:
Experience an exciting safari through the desert by quad bike and a thrilling ride through the sand dunes
Enjoy a ride on the back of a camel
Visit a traditional Bedouin village and learn more about the lifestyle of the desert inhabitants
Enjoy a variety of entertainment with a fire show and stargazing through a telescope
fullDescription:
Immerse yourself in the infinite expanse of the desert and enjoy a fast-paced quad bike tour through the sand dunes. Visit a Bedouin village, where you can learn more about the lives of the desert inhabitants and enjoy a traditional dinner.

A variety of entertainment will also be provided for your pleasure. You can enjoy a camel ride, admire the impressive fire show, and marvel at the beautiful starry sky through a telescope.
includes:
Pick-up and drop off at your hotel
Quad bike ride for approximately 1 hour
Camel ride for approximately 15 minutes
Dinner including drinks
Stargazing with a telescope

title: Sharm el-Sheikh Day Tiran Island or Ras Mohamed Park Snorkel
experiences:
Discover the underwater life and amazing corals of the Red Sea while snorkeling
Let your snorkel guide show you all the colorful fishes and corals
Have lunch and soft drinks served on-board
fullDescription:
Enjoy a full-day snorkel trip by boat to the best spots of Ras Mohamed or Tiran Strait. The trip is suitable for the whole family. You will discover many beautiful corals, which seem like underwater gardens. Besides that, you will meet plenty of colorful fishes, which are typical for the Red Sea. Your snorkel guide will gladly show you the best snorkeling places.

Transfer from your hotel to the jetty, where you will board a comfortable and specious boat, equipped with sun decks, perfect for relaxing or sunbathing the whole day. You will make 2 to 3 stops for snorkeling.

In the meantime, soft drinks and lunch will be served. The meeting time in the morning will be given after reconfirmation. You just need to bring your swimsuit, towel, suncream and good mood.
includes:
Mask, fins, life jacket, wetsuit (in wintertime only)
Lunch, soft drinks, water, tea and coffee

title: Sharm el-Sheikh: Snorkel & Camel Safari at Blue Hole
experiences:
See the incredible landscape of the Sinai Desert with its rock formations on the way to the Blue Hole
Learn more about the life of the desert denizens, visit a Bedouin cemetery and ride a camel
Discover the vibrant underwater world or relax on the beach at the Blue Hole
fullDescription:
After a pick-up from your hotel in Sharm el-Sheikh, get your first look at the incredible landscape you'll explore further on this tour of the Sinai Peninsula. Enjoy a view of the natural colors and rock formations and stop at a little oasis to get a closer look.

Then ride along the coast on the back of a camel to the Blue Hole, a renowned spot for diving and snorkeling 10 kilometers north of Dahab on the east coast of the Sinai Peninsula on the Gulf of Aqaba.

Let the stress of the everyday float away as you immerse yourself in this relaxing environment. Enjoy incredible views from atop a camel and under the water; immerse yourself in this unique world and watch the countless colorful fish and vibrant coral reefs up close or relax on the sand in the sun.

During the tour, enjoy a delicious lunch. On the journey back, enjoy an opportunity to walk around Dahab and do a bit of shopping before returning to your hotel.
includes:
Transfer to/from your hotel in an air-conditioned vehicle
Tour guide
Lunch
Drink
Camel ride

title: Sharm El Sheikh Bedouin Village and Dinner Tour
experiences:
Enjoy a barbecue dinner with the Bedouin villagers
Experience a camel ride across the desert
Watch an oriental show and listen to traditional music
fullDescription:
Your tour guide will pick you up from your hotel in Sharm El Sheikh and take you to the Bedouin village for a traditional dinner and to witness their daily life activities and traditions.

Then, you will have a chance to ride a camel - a classic Egyptian experience. You will also be able to witness the amazing panoramic views of the desert and sunset.

Finally, you will have a barbecue dinner and enjoy an oriental show including folkloric songs before being driven back to your hotel.
includes:
Pick-up/drop off service
Desert safari tour guide
Camel ride in the desert
Barbecue dinner with mineral water and soft drinks
All taxes & service charges

title: Sharm: Overnight Moses Mountain Climb & Sunrise Breakfast
experiences:
Visit Saint Catherine's Monastery, one of the oldest in the world, and a UNESCO World Heritage Site
Ascend the same mountain as Moses, in an overnight climb
Watch the sun rise from the summit of Mount Sinai
Eat breakfast at St. Catherine's Monastery after your epic climb
fullDescription:
You will be picked up from your hotel in Sharm el Sheikh at 7:00 PM and then drive for about 2 hours from Sharm to Moses Mountain in a coach.

On arrival you will start the ascent to the top of Mount Sinai. Reaching 2,285 meters, the climb includes about 750 steps, and will take you through the night to finish. On reaching the summit, gaze in awe as the sun rises, flooding the mountain with light.

After seeing the sunrise, you'll descend to St. Catherine's Monastery for breakfast. Saint Catherine's Monastery is on the Sinai Peninsula, at the mouth of a gorge at the foot of Mount Sinai in the city of Saint Catherine in Egypt. The monastery is Orthodox and is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

This monastery is one of the oldest working Christian monasteries in the world together with the Monastery of Saint Anthony, situated across the Red Sea in the desert south of Cairo, which also lays claim to that title.

After visiting this incredible ancient site, you will leave for Sharm El Sheikh, and arrive in Sharm at about 1:00 PM, enjoying a transfer you back to your hotel.
includes:
Pick-up/drop-off services from/to your hotel in Sharm
All transfers by a modern air-conditioned vehicle
Entrance fees
Breakfast and Drinks

title: Sharm El-Sheikh Full-Day Scuba Diving Tour
experiences:
Scuba dive at some of the best dive sites in the Red Sea
Discover old shipwrecks that provide shelter to hundreds of fish, including big fish like tune
Tailor the dive experience to suit your skill level
See the Lara wreck, and the wreck of SS Thistlegorm, where World War II equipment is still stored
Admire the soft and hard coral of Jackson Reef
Dive among sharks, large pelagic and the occasional hammerhead
Enjoy the shallow swim throughs and sandy patches
fullDescription:
Explore the underwater world of the Red Sea on a full-day diving tour from Sharm El-Sheikh. Following a meet up with your guide, who will provide all necessary equipment, you will enjoy a local dive to get orientated, before heading to the Lara wreck, Jackson Reef, and the Sinai Peninsula.

You can receive instruction tailored for beginners, and for those with more experience. Depending on your skill level, swim through schools of fish to a spot where sharks often gather. Proceed toward the wreck Yolanda to reach a plateau 15-25 meters (50-80 feet) deep, scattered with small ergs and coral outcrops where stone fish and scorpion fish feed. The wreck of the Yolanda, complete with its cargo of toilets and baths, provides home to big fish, such as tuna, bluefish, and the occasional hammerhead.

Another popular dive site is Jackson Reef on the northernmost of the 4 reefs that separate the Sinai and Saudi Arabia. Strong currents make it ideal for large pelagic, sharks and other big fish. Admire soft and hard coral, and look for barracudas, jacks, hammerheads, and tiger sharks.

The remains of the Cypriot merchant ship Lara, which collided with the reef in 1981, lies at depths of 45 meters (147 feet) and more, while the wreck of the SS Thistlegorm holds World War II machinery and equipment, still neatly stowed in its open holds, making for a fantastic dive experience.

This most famous Sinai Peninsula dive has to be experienced to truly appreciate its wonders. The group of coral heads at Temple come up from a depth of 12-20 meters (40-65 feet). If viewed in the right position, and using your imagination, they look like columns of a temple.

For a less challenging dive, there are sandy patches at about 8 meters (25 feet) with lots of inlets into the shore reefs, and coral heads about 2 meters (6.5 feet) apart, allowing you to swim between them.
includes:
Transfer from/to hotel in Sharm El-Sheikh
Lunch and soft drinks
All diving equipment
